Word: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى ٱلۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ ٱلشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٞ
Meaning: And when My servants ask you about Me, I Am near;
(for present/future)

Word: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالـِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ
Meaning: And recall when We appointed for Moses forty nights. Then you took [for worship] the calf after him,
So Allah caused him to die for a hundred years; then He revived him.

Word: كَيۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَةَۢ بَيۡنَ ٱلۡأَغۡنِيَآءِ مِنكُمۡۚ
Meaning: Then (directly after)/so

Word: لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ ٱلثَّرَىٰ
Meaning: He said, “How can Allah revive this after its demise?” So Allah caused him to die for a hundred years;
He said, “Then take four birds,…”
Of (belonging to)

Word: مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَهُدٗى وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
Meaning: But Allah chooses for His mercy whomever He wills. Allah is Possessor of Sublime Grace.

Word: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ
Meaning: Of (belonging to)
And give those of kinship his rights, and the poor, and the wayfarer,

Word: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ

Meaning: they would have sought a way to the Lord of the Throne.

Word: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَةٗۚ

Meaning: and We sheltered them on high ground with security and flowing springs.

Word: وَإِذَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُنَّ مَتَٰعٗا فَسۡـَٔلُوهُنَّ مِن وَرَآءِ حِجَابٖۚ
Meaning: Of (belonging to)
Those of you who have affluence and means should not refuse to give

Word: فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَ مِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ
Meaning: to give to the relatives, and the needy, and the emigrants for the sake of Allah.
Family/ People of

Word: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ
Meaning: It is never the wish of the disbelievers from among the People of the Book, nor of the polytheists,
If you fear a breach between the two, appoint an arbiter from his family and an arbiter from her family.

Word: وَصِيَّةٗ لِّأَزۡوَٰجِهِم مَّتَٰعًا إِلَى ٱلۡحَوۡلِ غَيۡرَ إِخۡرَاجٖۚ
Meaning: Family/ people of
And recall when We delivered you from the people of Pharaoh. They inflicted on you terrible persecution,

Word: وَٱقۡتُلُوهُمۡ حَيۡثُ ثَقِفۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَأَخۡرِجُوهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ أَخۡرَجُوكُمۡۚ
Meaning: and will complete His blessing upon you and upon the family of Jacob,

Word: وَحَيۡثُ مَا كُنتُمۡ فَوَلُّواْ وُجُوهَكُمۡ شَطۡرَهُۥۗ
Meaning: Lo!/ Will .. not ?
Lo! in the remembrance of Allah hearts do find rest.

Word: أَيۡنَمَا تَكُونُواْ يُدۡرِككُّمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ وَلَوۡ كُنتُمۡ فِي بُرُوجٖ مُّشَيَّدَةٖۗ

Meaning: shall he keep it with ignominy or bury it in the dust! Unquestionably, vile is that which they judge!
Do you not love for Allah to pardon you?
What a good … !

Word: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَن تَبَوَّءَا لِقَوۡمِكُمَا بِـمِصۡرَ بُيُوتٗا
Meaning: We found him patient. What an excellent servant! He was obedient.
And Noah called out to Us, and We are the Best of responders.
What a foul/ bad ..!
then I will consign him to the punishment of the Fire; how miserable the destiny!”

Word: وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنّـِي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
Meaning: Sufficient for him is Hellfire, and how wretched is the resting place.
Like

Word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ وَفِي ٱلنَّارِ هُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ
Meaning: And due to the wives is similar to what is expected of them, according to what is reasonable.

Word: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ
Meaning: Example

Word: فَمَن لَّمۡ يَجِدۡ فَصِيَامُ ثَلَٰثَةِ أَيَّامٖ فِي ٱلۡحَجِّ
Meaning: Their likeness is like that of a person who kindled a fire; when it illuminated all around him,
Or
Or like a rainstorm from the sky, in which is darkness, and thunder, and lightning.

Word: وَإِنَّ يَوۡمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَـأَلۡفِ سَنَةٖ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
Meaning: Then after that your hearts hardened. They were as rocks, or even harder.
Or ?

Word: لِلۡفُقَرَآءِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُحۡصِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ
Meaning: or are you saying about Allah what you do not know?”

Word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
Meaning: Or do you want to question your Messenger as Moses was questioned before?
Some/ part (of)

Word: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ حَسَنَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِۖ
Meaning: We said, “Strike him with part of it. Thus does Allah bring the dead to life,
He said, “I have tarried for a day, or part of a day.”
Every/ each

Word: وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰٓ أَشَدِّ ٱلۡعَذَابِۗ
Meaning: he said, “I know that Allah has power over all things.”

Word: يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
Meaning: then place a part on each hill,
Perhaps/ may

Word: وَلَا تَحۡلِقُواْ رُءُوسَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَبۡلُغَ ٱلۡهَدۡيُ مَحِلَّهُۥ
Meaning: And what may make you perceive? Perhaps the Hour is near.

Word: لَن تَنَالُواْ ٱلۡبِرَّ حَتَّىٰ تُنفِقُواْ مِمَّا تُحِبُّونَۚ
Meaning: And obey Allah and the Messenger, that you may obtain mercy.
Possibly/ may

Word: ثُمَّ ٱجۡعَلۡ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ جَبَلٖ مِّنۡهُنَّ جُزۡءٗا
Meaning: But it may be that you dislike something while it is good for you,

Word: وَلِلَّهِ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ حِجُّ ٱلۡبَيۡتِ مَنِ ٱسۡتَطَاعَ إِلَيۡهِ سَبِيلٗاۚ
Meaning: and it may be that you like something while it is bad for you.
O!
“O my people, you have done wrong to yourselves by worshiping the calf.”

Word: رَبَّنَا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرۡ عَنَّا سَيِّـَٔاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ ٱلۡأَبۡرَارِ
Meaning: And [recall] when you said, “O Moses, we will never believe you unless we see Allah outright.”
O you who have believed, say not [to Allah's Messenger], "Ra'ina"
At/ with/ from
They have different ranks with Allah,…
when the hearts are at the throats, choking them.

Word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَسۡتَحۡيِۦٓ أَن يَضۡرِبَ مَثَلٗا مَّا بَعُوضَةٗ فَمَا فَوۡقَهَاۚ
Meaning: And then We would have given them from Us a great reward.
Not (negation)

Word: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
Meaning: but they deceive not except themselves

Word: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ
Meaning: They did not wrong Us, but they were [only] wronging themselves.
What (question word)

Word: فَإِنۡ ءَامَنُواْ بِمِثۡلِ مَآ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ فَقَدِ ٱهۡتَدَواْۖ
Meaning: He said, “What prevented you from prostrating when I have commanded you?”

Word: فَمَن يَمۡلِكُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ أَن يُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡمَسِيحَ
Meaning: He said, “O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray.”
Which/ that (Relative pronoun)

Word: لَئِنۢ بَسَطتَ إِلَيَّ يَدَكَ لِتَقۡتُلَنِي مَآ أَنَا۠ بِبَاسِطٖ يَدِيَ إِلَيۡكَ لِأَقۡتُلَكَۖ
Meaning: Their example is like that of one who kindled a fire; and when it lit up all that was around it,
And We will have removed whatever is within their breasts of resentment,

Word: قَالَ يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰٓ أَعَجَزۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِثۡلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡغُرَابِ
Meaning: (with)

Word: قَالَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ مَا يَكُونُ لِيٓ أَنۡ أَقُولَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِحَقٍّۚ
Meaning: With which
He is fully Informed of what you do.

Word: وَلَّىٰ مُسۡتَكۡبِرٗا كَأَن لَّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَا كَأَنَّ فِيٓ أُذُنَيۡهِ وَقۡرٗاۖ
Meaning: He said, “My Lord, with what you have favored me, I will not be…”

Word: وَإِذۡ نَتَقۡنَا ٱلۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُۥ ظُلَّةٞ
Meaning: With what?
“What good news do you bring?”

Word: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ
Meaning: and will see what [reply] the messengers will return."

Word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
Meaning: (about)
About which?

Word: فَلَمَّا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُۥ قَالَ أَعۡلَمُ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
Meaning: and your Lord is not unaware of what they do.
and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent.
About what?

Word: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَبۡصَٰرِهِمۡۚ
Meaning: What are they asking one another about?
(in)
In which

Word: فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُۥ لَكُنتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
Meaning: to judge between people regarding their differences.

Word: وَلَوۡلَا دَفۡعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعۡضَهُم بِبَعۡضٖ لَّفَسَدَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ
Meaning: they attribute partners to Him in what He has given them.
In what?

Word: وَيَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَتۡ سُورَةٞۖ
Meaning: In what (position) are you that you should mention it?
they will say, “What was the matter with you?”

Word: أَمۡ تُرِيدُونَ أَن تَسۡـَٔلُواْ رَسُولَكُمۡ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُۗ
Meaning: (from)

Word: وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَبۡلَ طُلُوعِ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَقَبۡلَ غُرُوبِهَاۖ
Meaning: From which
and give from what We have provided for them.

Word: ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ
Meaning: So consume from what you have gained, lawful and good

Word: وَلَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بَعۡدَ ٱلَّذِي جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ
Meaning: From what?
So let man observe from what he was created.

Word: وَ إِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ
Meaning: (for)

Word: وَ إِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَمۡنٗا
Meaning: To/ for which
should a messenger come to you verifying what you have,

Word: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَٰبَتۡهُم مُّصِيبَةٞ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَإِنَّآ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ
Meaning: “And verifying what lies before me of the Torah,”

Word: وَ إِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
Meaning: For what? Why?
Say, “Why did you kill Allah’s prophets”

Word: وَإِذۡ وَٰعَدۡنَا مُوسَىٰٓ أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَةٗ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ
Meaning: O People of the Book! Why do you argue about Abraham,

Word: فَأَمَاتَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِاْئَةَ عَامٖ ثُمَّ بَعَثَهُۥۖ
Meaning: (like)
Just like

Word: قَالَ أَنَّىٰ يُحۡيِۦ هَٰذِهِ ٱللَّهُ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۖ فَأَمَاتَهُ ٱللَّهُ مِاْئَةَ عَامٖ
Meaning: Those to whom We have given the Book recognize it as they recognize their own children.
“You have come to Us individually, just as We created you the first time,…”
(verily)

Word: وَٱللَّهُ يَخۡتَصُّ بِرَحۡمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
Meaning: Verily is
Say, “Verily miracles are only with Allah,…”

Word: وَءَاتِ ذَا ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُۥ وَٱلۡمِسۡكِينَ وَٱبۡنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
Meaning: Lest you say, “Verily, The Scripture was revealed to two parties before us,…”
(that)

Word: إِذٗا لَّٱبۡتَغَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلٗا
Meaning: That
And know that your possessions and your children are a test,

Word: وَءَاوَيۡنَٰهُمَآ إِلَىٰ رَبۡوَةٖ ذَاتِ قَرَارٖ وَمَعِينٖ
Meaning: and that they may know that He is but one God
(as if)

Word: وَلَا يَأۡتَلِ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡفَضۡلِ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلسَّعَةِ أَن يُؤۡتُوٓاْ
Meaning: As if
They will have from Allah no protector. It will be as if their faces are covered with pieces of the night - so dark [are they].

Word: أَن يُؤۡتُوٓاْ أُوْلِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡمَسَٰكِينَ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۖ
Meaning: as though he were climbing up the sky.
(every)

Word: مَّا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَلَا ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
Meaning: Every time Whenever

Word: وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ شِقَاقَ بَيۡنِهِمَا فَٱبۡعَثُواْ حَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهِۦ وَحَكَمٗا مِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَآ
Meaning: Every time a nation enters, it will curse its sister.
As he was building the ark, and whenever some of his people passed by him, they ridiculed him.

Word: وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
Meaning: (where)

Word: وَيُتِمُّ نِعۡمَتَهُۥ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ كَمَآ أَتَمَّهَا
Meaning: Wherever
They are cursed; wherever they are found,
So wherever you [might] turn, there is the Face of Allah.
Where (?)

Word: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ
Meaning: And among those We created is a community which guides by truth and thereby establishes justice. (7:181)
Falsehood

Meaning: That He should establish the truth and abolish falsehood, even if the criminals disliked it. (8:8)

Meaning: And say, "Truth has come, and falsehood has departed. Indeed is falsehood, [by nature], ever bound to depart." (17:81)
Praise

Word: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ
Meaning: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds - (1:2)

Word: فَتَلَقَّىٰٓ ءَادَمُ مِن رَّبِّهِۦ كَلِمَٰتٖ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِۚ
Meaning: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him]. (15:98)
Wisdom

Word: وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيۡمَٰنُ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ كَفَرُواْ
Meaning: and David killed Goliath, and Allah gave him the kingship and prophethood and taught him from that which He willed. (2:251)

Word: وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِهِۦ دَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيۡمَٰنَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَۚ

Piety/ Fear of Allah

Meaning: And cooperate in righteousness and piety, but do not cooperate in sin and aggression. (5:2)

Word: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ

Word: وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ هُدٗى لِّبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
Meaning: Indeed Allah is ever, over all things, a Witness. (4:33)
Witnesses

Word: وَلَقَدۡ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُۥدَ زَبُورٗا
Meaning: And thus we have made you a just community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. (2:143)

Word: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ
Meaning: Martyrs
so that Allah may make evident those who believe and [may] take to Himself from among you martyrs - and Allah does not like the wrongdoers (3:140)
Clear
and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy. (2:208)

Word: يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ
Meaning: Indeed, the disbelievers are ever to you a clear enemy. (4:101)
Light

Peace

Meaning: And when those come to you who believe in Our verses, say, "Peace be upon you. (6:54)

Word: وَإِلَىٰ مَدۡيَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
Meaning: Dominion/ Reign

Word: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَٰلِحٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
Meaning: And David killed Goliath, and Allah gave him the kingship and prophethood (2:251)
Authority/ Warrant/ Proof

Word: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُودٗاۚ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ
Meaning: And those - We have made for you against them a clear authorization. (4:91)
Authority

Word: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

god/ deity

Meaning: deities

Word: شَهۡرُ رَمَضَانَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُنزِلَ فِيهِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ هُدٗى لِّلنَّاسِ

One

Word: وَلۡيَحۡكُمۡ أَهۡلُ ٱلۡإِنجِيلِ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِۚ
Meaning: They said, "We will worship your God and the God of your fathers, Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac - one God. (2:133)

Word: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
Meaning: And they were not commanded except to worship one God; (9:31)
One

Word: وَلَوۡ أَنَّهُمۡ أَقَامُواْ ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡهِم
Meaning: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One, (112:1)

Word: وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَقّٗا فِي ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةِ وَٱلۡإِنجِيلِ وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِۚ
Meaning: Anyone

Word: وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمَ خَلَقَهَاۖ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡءٞ وَمَنَٰفِع

Meaning: Unseen

Meaning: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Grand, the Exalted. (13:9)
Throne

there is no deity except Him. On Him I have relied, and He is the Lord of the Great Throne." (9:129)

Meaning: Books

Meaning: Word

 No change is there in the words of Allah. That is what is the great attainment. (10:64)
Angel

Word: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
Meaning: Angels

Word: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ

Covenant/ Pledge

Meaning: and fulfill My covenant [upon you] that I will fulfill your covenant [from Me], and be afraid of [only] Me. (2:40)
Covenant

Meaning: And [recall] when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, [enjoining upon them], "Do not worship except Allah; (2:83)
And [recall] when We took your covenant, [saying], "Do not shed each other's blood or evict one another (2:84)

Satan (Devil)

Meaning: Satan (Devils)

Meaning: And thus We have made for every prophet an enemy - devils from mankind and jinn, (6:112)
Deed/ action

Deeds/ actions
and they have [evil] deeds besides disbelief which they are doing, (23:63)

Meaning: Good/ Good deed(s)

Word: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡمَآءِ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ حَيٍّۚ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
Meaning: What comes to you of good is from Allah, but what comes to you of evil, [O man], is from yourself. (4:79)
Good/ Good deed(s)

Meaning: Bad/ misdeed/ sin
and if evil befalls them, they say, "This is from you." (4:78)

Word: وَإِذَا كَانُواْ مَعَهُۥ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ جَامِعٖ لَّمۡ يَذۡهَبُواْ حَتَّىٰ يَسۡتَـٔۡذِنُوهُ ۚ
Meaning: Bad/ misdees/ sins

Word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ أَفۡتُونِي فِيٓ أَمۡرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَدُونِ
Meaning: But repentance is not [accepted] of those who [continue to] do evil deeds up until, when death comes to one of them, (4:18)
Good

Word: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَكَۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
Meaning: Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy." (28:26)
Evil/ Worst
This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return - (38:55)

Word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ
Meaning: Indeed, the worst of living creatures in the sight of Allah are the deaf and dumb who do not use reason. (8:22)

Word: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
Meaning: And when it is said to him, "Fear Allah," pride in the sin takes hold of him. (2:206)

Word: فَسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
Meaning: Sin
The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. (40:3)

Word: وَمِن قَوۡمِ مُوسَىٰٓ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
Meaning: Sins

Word: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
Meaning: Those who say, "Our Lord, indeed we have believed, so forgive us our sins and protect us from the punishment of the Fire," (3:16)
Blame

Meaning: There is no blame upon you for seeking bounty from your Lord [during Hajj]. (2:198)

Word: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا
Meaning: And any that you desire of those [wives] from whom you had [temporarily] separated - there is no blame upon you [in returning her]. (33:51)
Unlawful (forbidden)

Word: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ
Meaning: Permissible (halal)
And do not say about what your tongues assert of untruth, "This is lawful and this is unlawful," to invent falsehood about Allah. (16:116)

Word: وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَعَلَّمَهُۥ مِمَّا يَشَآءُۗ
Meaning: eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. (2:168)

Word: يُؤۡتِي ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَمَن يُؤۡتَ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ فَقَدۡ أُوتِيَ خَيۡرٗا كَثِيرٗاۗ
Meaning: Conversation/ Discourse
so do not sit with them until they enter into another conversation. (4:140)

Word: وَتَعَاوَنُواْ عَلَى ٱلۡبِرِّ وَٱلتَّقۡوَىٰۖ وَلَا تَعَاوَنُواْ عَلَى ٱلۡإِثۡمِ وَٱلۡعُدۡوَٰنِۚ
Meaning: Then perhaps you would kill yourself through grief over them, [O Muhammad], if they do not believe in this message, [and] out of sorrow. (18:6)
Good thing
Have you not considered how Allah presents an example, [making] a good word like a good tree, (14:24)

Word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَسَطٗا لِّتَكُونُواْ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۗ
Meaning: eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. (2:168)

Word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ شَهِيدًا
Meaning: Good things
O you who have believed, eat from the good things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allah (2:172)

Word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَٰكُمۡ أُمَّةٗ وَسَطٗا لِّتَكُونُواْ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ وَيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ شَهِيدٗاۗ
Meaning: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned (2:267)
Reward/ Compensation

Word: وَلِيَعۡلَمَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَتَّخِذَ مِنكُمۡ شُهَدَآءَۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
Meaning: For those who did good among them and feared Allah is a great reward - (3:172)
Rewards/ Compensations

Word: وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
Meaning: and you will only be given your [full] compensation on the Day of Resurrection. (3:185)

Word: إِنَّ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كَانُواْ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٗا مُّبِينٗا
Meaning: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His bounty. (35:30)
Day

Word: قَدۡ جَآءَكُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ نُورٞ وَكِتَٰبٞ مُّبِينٞ
Meaning: Sovereign of the Day of Recompense. (1:4)

Word: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَا ٱلتَّوۡرَىٰةَ فِيهَا هُدٗى وَنُورٞۚ
Meaning: they said, "There is no power for us today against Goliath and his soldiers." 2:249
And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah and the Last Day," but they are not believers. (2:8)

Word: وَإِذَا جَآءَكَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ
Meaning: Days

Word: يَهۡدِي بِهِ ٱللَّهُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ سُبُلَ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ
Meaning: And they say, "Never will the Fire touch us, except for a few days." (2:80)
That day, then

Word: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۚ
Meaning: And the weighing [of deeds] that Day will be the truth. (7:8)

Word: وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ وَءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكَ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ
Meaning: And We will leave them that day surging over each other, (18:99)
Resurrection

Word: وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ جَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٗا مُّبِينٗا
Meaning: But Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ. (2:113)
He will surely assemble you for [account on] the Day of Resurrection, about which there is no doubt. (4:87)

Word: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِهِۦ سُلۡطَٰنٗا
Meaning: An hour (The Hour)
until when the Hour [of resurrection] comes upon them unexpectedly, they will say, "Oh, [how great is] our regret (6:31)

Word: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ
Meaning: So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour, nor will they precede [it]. (7:34)

Word: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ إِلَٰهَكَ وَ إِلَٰهَ ءَابَآئِكَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
Meaning: Allah has already forgiven the Prophet and the Muhajireen and the Ansar who followed him in the hour of difficulty (9:117)
Term

Word: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَشۡهَدُونَ أَنَّ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخۡرَىٰۚ قُل لَّآ أَشۡهَدُۚ
Meaning: And for every nation is a [specified] term. So when their time has come, they will not remain behind an hour, (7:34)
But when We removed the punishment from them until a term which they were to reach, then at once they broke their word. (7:135)

Word: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ إِلَٰهَكَ وَإِلَٰهَ ءَابَآئِكَ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
Meaning: Specific

Word: وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗا
Meaning: and then decreed a term and a specified time [known] to Him; (6:2)
O you who have believed, when you contract a debt for a specified term, write it down. (2:282)
Account
Those will have a share of what they have earned, and Allah is swift in account. (2:202)

Word: ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَلِّغُونَ رِسَٰلَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَهُۥ وَلَا يَخۡشَوۡنَ أَحَدًا إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۗ
Meaning: And whoever disbelieves in the verses of Allah, then indeed, Allah is swift in [taking] account. (3:19)
The Hereafter

Word: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ ١٦٢لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ
Meaning: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muhammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith]. (2:4)
And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous. (2:130)

Word: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا جَعَلَا لَهُۥ شُرَكَآءَ فِيمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمَاۚ
Meaning: Forever, ever
They said, "O Moses, indeed we will not enter it, ever, as long as they are within it; (5:24)
and He has prepared for them gardens beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever. (9:100)

Word: وَلَوۡ كُنتُ أَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ لَٱسۡتَكۡثَرۡتُ مِنَ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِيَ ٱلسُّوٓءُۚ
Meaning: End

Word: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ
Meaning: so proceed throughout the earth and observe how was the end of those who denied. (3:137)
Say, "Travel through the land; then observe how was the end of the deniers." (6:11)

Word: ثُمَّ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
Meaning: Hell Fire, hell
[It is but] a small enjoyment; then their [final] refuge is Hell, and wretched is the resting place. (3:197)
Fire
And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger and transgresses His limits - He will put him into the Fire to abide eternally therein, (4:14)

Word: لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
Meaning: Woe to
so woe to those who disbelieved - from the scene of a tremendous Day. (19:37)

Word: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ لَا رَيۡبَۛ فِيهِۛ هُدٗى لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ
Meaning: So woe to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allah," (2:79)

Word: وَٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَۖ
Meaning: Penalty
Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified. (38:14)

Word: كُلٌّ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيۡنَ أَحَدٖ مِّن رُّسُلِهِۦ
Meaning: Know that Allah is severe in penalty and that Allah is Forgiving and Merciful. (5:98)
Punishment

Word: يَحۡلِفُونَ بِٱللَّهِ مَا قَالُواْ وَلَقَدۡ قَالُواْ كَلِمَةَ ٱلۡكُفۡرِ وَكَفَرُواْ
Meaning: For them in this world is disgrace, and they will have in the Hereafter a great punishment. (2:114)

Word: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكِ بِكَلِمَةٖ مِّنۡهُ ٱسۡمُهُ ٱلۡمَسِيحُ عِيسَى ٱبۡنُ مَرۡيَمَ
Meaning: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day." (6:15)
Painful

Word: لَا تَبۡدِيلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
Meaning: will have a drink of scalding water and a painful punishment for what they used to deny. (10:4)
But whoever transgresses after that will have a painful punishment. (2:178)
Reward/ Recompense
But they who have earned [blame for] evil doings - the recompense of an evil deed is its equivalent, and humiliation will cover them. (10:27)

Word: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ
Meaning: But as for one who believes and does righteousness, he will have a reward of Paradise, (18:88)
Reward

Word: ٱلَّذِينَ يَنقُضُونَ عَهۡدَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مِيثَٰقِهِۦ
Meaning: and the enduring good deeds are better to your Lord for reward and better for recourse. (19:76)

Word: وَأَوۡفُواْ بِعَهۡدِيٓ أُوفِ بِعَهۡدِكُمۡ وَإِيَّٰيَ فَٱرۡهَبُونِ
Meaning: and whoever desires the reward of the Hereafter - We will give him thereof. (3:145)
Paradise/ garden

Word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ لَا تَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ
Meaning: So he who is drawn away from the Fire and admitted to Paradise has attained [his desire]. (3:185)

Word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَكُمۡ لَا تَسۡفِكُونَ دِمَآءَكُمۡ وَلَا تُخۡرِجُونَ أَنفُسَكُم
Meaning: Paradise/ gardens
And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow. (2:25)

Word: وَمَا هُم بِضَآرِّينَ بِهِۦ مِنۡ أَحَدٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ
Meaning: This world (present life)

Word: فَهَزَمُوهُم بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتَلَ دَاوُۥدُ جَالُوتَ
Meaning: Those are the ones who have bought the life of this world [in exchange] for the Hereafter, (2:86)
And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous. (2:130)
Worlds
[All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds (1:2)

Word: وَكَذَٰلِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِيٍّ عَدُوّٗا شَيَٰطِينَ ٱلۡإِنسِ وَٱلۡجِنِّ
Meaning: When his Lord said to him, "Submit", he said "I have submitted [in Islam] to the Lord of the worlds." (2:131)
Wealth

Word: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
Meaning: Indeed, those who disbelieve - never will their wealth or their children avail them against Allah at all. (3:10)
And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, (2:155)

Word: وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ
Meaning: House
My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. (71:28)

Word: مَّآ أَصَابَكَ مِنۡ حَسَنَةٖ فَمِنَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَآ أَصَابَكَ مِن سَيِّئَةٖ فَمِن نَّفۡسِكَۚ
Meaning: she said, "My Lord, build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Pharaoh (66:11)
The Ka’ba
For the accustomed security of the Quraysh - (1) Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer - (2) Let them worship the Lord of this House, (3) (106:1-3)
And [mention] when We made the House a place of return for the people and [a place of] security. (2:125)

Word: وَإِن تُصِبۡهُمۡ سَيِّئَةٞ يَقُولُواْ هَٰذِهِۦ مِنۡ عِندِكَۚ
Meaning: Home
For them will be the Home of Peace with their Lord. And He will be their protecting friend protector because of what they used to do. (6:127)

Word: وَلَيۡسَتِ ٱلتَّوۡبَةُ لِلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَهُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ
Meaning: So the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone. (7:91)
Homes

Word: رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ إِلَيَّ مِنۡ خَيۡرٖ فَقِيرٞ
Meaning: Have you not considered those who left their homes in many thousands, (2:243)

Word: إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
Meaning: Provision/ enjoyment
But what is the enjoyment of worldly life compared to the Hereafter except a [very] little. (9:38)
O mankind, your injustice is only against yourselves, [being merely] the enjoyment of worldly life. (10:23)

Word: إِنَّ شَرَّ ٱلدَّوَآبِّ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلۡبُكۡمُ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
Meaning: Place, in place of
So she conceived him, and she withdrew with him to a remote place. (19:22)

Word: فَمَن تَعَجَّلَ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِ وَمَن تَأَخَّرَ فَلَآ إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِۖ
Meaning: And when We substitute a verse in place of a verse - and Allah is most knowing of what He sends down - they say, "You, [O Muhammad], are but an inventor [of lies]." (16:101)

Word: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ
Meaning: City/ Town
And [recall] when We said, "Enter this city and eat from it wherever you will in [ease and] abundance, (2:58)

Word: غَافِرِ ٱلذَّنۢبِ وَقَابِلِ ٱلتَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ ٱلۡعِقَابِ ذِي ٱلطَّوۡلِۖ
Meaning: Or [consider such an example] as the one who passed by a township which had fallen into ruin. (2:259)
Cities/ Towns

Word: رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
Meaning: And this is a Book which We have sent down, blessed and confirming what was before it, that you may warn the Mother of Cities and those around it. (6:92)
That is because your Lord would not destroy the cities for wrongdoing while their people were unaware. (6:131)

Word: لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَن تَبۡتَغُواْ فَضۡلٗا مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡۚ
Meaning: City

Word: وَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَيۡتَ مِمَّنۡ عَزَلۡتَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكَۚ
Meaning: Indeed, this is a conspiracy which you conspired in the city to expel therefrom its people. (7:123)
And women in the city said, "The wife of al-'Azeez is seeking to seduce her slave boy; (12:30)

Word: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُكُمُ ٱلۡكَذِبَ هَٰذَا حَلَٰلٞ وَهَٰذَا حَرَامٞ لِّتَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۚ
Meaning: Madinah/ the city
and [also] from the people of Madinah. They have become accustomed to hypocrisy. You, [O Muhammad], do not know them, (9:101)

Word: وَلَا تَقُولُواْ لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُكُمُ ٱلۡكَذِبَ هَٰذَا حَلَٰلٞ وَهَٰذَا حَرَامٞ لِّتَفۡتَرُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَۚ
Meaning: They say, "If we return to al-Madinah, the more honored [for power] will surely expel therefrom the more humble." (63:8)

Word: كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ
Meaning: Way
They have taken their oaths as a cover, so they averted [people] from the way of Allah. (63:2)

Word: فَلَا تَقۡعُدُواْ مَعَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُواْ فِي حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِهِۦ
Meaning: Indeed, your Lord is most knowing of who has gone astray from His way, and He is most knowing of the [rightly] guided. (68:7)

Word: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
Meaning: Ways
And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse (19) That you may follow therein roads of passage.' " (71:19-20)

Word: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا كَلِمَةٗ طَيِّبَةٗ كَشَجَرَةٖ طَيِّبَةٍ
Meaning: Path

Word: كُلُواْ مِمَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗا وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ
Meaning: Guide us to the straight path - (1:6)
And indeed, you invite them to a straight path. (23:73)

Word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ كُلُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا رَزَقۡنَٰكُمۡ وَٱشۡكُرُواْ لِلَّهِ
Meaning: Mosque

Word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنفِقُواْ مِن طَيِّبَٰتِ مَا كَسَبۡتُمۡ
Meaning: turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Haram (sacred mosque). (2:150)
Mosques

Word: لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُواْ مِنۡهُمۡ وَٱتَّقَوۡاْ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٌ
Meaning: It is not for the polytheists to maintain the mosques of Allah [while] witnessing against themselves with disbelief. (9:17)
Trial
But the two angels do not teach anyone unless they say, "We are a trial, so do not disbelieve [by practicing magic]." (2:102)
And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced (74:31)
Meeting
Those will have lost who deny the meeting with Allah, (6:31)

Word: قَالُواْ لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِهِۦۚ
Meaning: So today We will forget them just as they forgot the meeting of this Day of theirs and for having rejected Our verses. (7:51)

Word: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ
Meaning: Relatives
Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans, (4:36)

Word: وَقَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَةٗۚ
Meaning: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives (59:7)
Parents
And [recall] when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, [enjoining upon them], "Do not worship except Allah; and to parents do good (2:83)

Word: وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ
Meaning: Worship Allah and associate nothing with Him, and to parents do good, and to relatives, orphans, (4:36)
Mother

Word: فَٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
Meaning: And We inspired to the mother of Moses, "Suckle him; (28:7)

Word: لَيَجۡمَعَنَّكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِۗ
Meaning: And the heart of Moses' mother became empty [of all else]. (28:10)
Father/ O father

Word: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَتۡهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ قَالُواْ يَٰحَسۡرَتَنَا
Meaning: She said, "Indeed, my father invites you that he may reward you for having watered for us." (28:25)

Word: فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ وَلَا يَسۡتَقۡدِمُونَ
Meaning: One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy." (28:26)

Word: لَّقَد تَّابَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلنَّبِيِّ وَٱلۡمُهَٰجِرِينَ وَٱلۡأَنصَارِ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ فِي سَاعَةِ ٱلۡعُسۡرَةِ
Meaning: Forefathers/ Ancestors
And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allah has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing/ upon." (2:170)

Word: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَةٗ
Meaning: they say, "Rather, we will follow that upon which we found our fathers." (31:21)

Word: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
Meaning: (Spouse) Husband/ Wife
And We said, "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise (2:35)

Word: ثُمَّ قَضَىٰٓ أَجَلٗاۖ وَأَجَلٞ مُّسَمًّى عِندَهُۥ
Meaning: It is He who created you from one soul and created from it its mate that he might dwell in security with her. (7:189)

Word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا تَدَايَنتُم بِدَيۡنٍ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗى فَٱكۡتُبُوهُ
Meaning: Man
Have the people been amazed that We revealed [revelation] to a man from among them, (10:2)

Word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيبٞ مِّمَّا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱللَّهُ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
Meaning: And if We had made him an angel, We would have made him [appear as] a man, (6:9)

Word: وَمَن يَكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلۡحِسَابِ
Meaning: Woman
Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, (27:23)

Word: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبۡلِكَ وَبِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِنُونَ
Meaning: Wife

Word: وَلَقَدِ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
Meaning: Allah presents an example of those who disbelieved: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. (66:10)
Offspring

Word: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَن نَّدۡخُلَهَآ أَبَدٗا مَّا دَامُواْ فِيهَا
Meaning: At that, Zechariah called upon his Lord, saying, "My Lord, grant me from Yourself a good offspring. (3:38)

Word: وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي تَحۡتَهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ
Meaning: And let those [executors and guardians] fear [injustice] as if they [themselves] had left weak offspring behind and feared for them. (4:9)
Son (child)

Word: فَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
Meaning: They say, "Allah has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. (2:116)

Word: قُلۡ سِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ثُمَّ ٱنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
Meaning: Sons (children)
Those will have lost who killed their children in foolishness without knowledge (6:140)

Word: مَتَٰعٞ قَلِيلٞ ثُمَّ مَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ
Meaning: Son
And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit. (2:87)

Word: وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَيَتَعَدَّ حُدُودَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ نَارًا خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَا
Meaning: sons
Those to whom We gave the Scripture know him as they know their own sons. (2:146)

Word: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن مَّشۡهَدِ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٍ
Meaning: Brothers

Word: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُبُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّه
Meaning: Say, "Improvement for them is best. And if you mix your affairs with theirs - they are your brothers. (2:220)
And [some] among their fathers and their descendants and their brothers - and We chose them and We guided them to a straight path. (6:87)

Word: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
Meaning: Guardian/ Supporter

Word: ٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
Meaning: But if the one who has the obligation is of limited understanding or weak or unable to dictate himself, then let his guardian dictate in justice. (2:282)
Guardian/ Supporter

Word: لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا خِزۡيٞ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ
Meaning: Let not believers take disbelievers as allies rather than believers. (3:28)

Word: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
Meaning: Male
Whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - We will surely cause him to live a good life, (16:97)

Word: لَهُمۡ شَرَابٞ مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ وَعَذَابٌ أَلِيمُۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡفُرُونَ
Meaning: but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, (40:40)

Word: فَمَنِ ٱعۡتَدَىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَهُۥ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
Meaning: Female
"My Lord, I have delivered a female." And Allah was most knowing of what she delivered, "And the male is not like the female. (3:36)

Word: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَسَبُواْ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ جَزَآءُ سَيِّئَةِۭ بِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّةٞۖ
Meaning: but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, (40:40)

Word: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ
Meaning: Face/ Countenance
That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, (30:38)

Word: وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٞ مَّرَدًّا
Meaning: Faces/ Countenance

Word: وَمَن يُرِدۡ ثَوَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ نُؤۡتِهِۦ مِنۡهَاۚ
Meaning: On the Day [some] faces will turn white and [some] faces will turn black. (3:106)
Vision

Word: فَمَن زُحۡزِحَ عَنِ ٱلنَّارِ وَأُدۡخِلَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ فَقَدۡ فَازَۗ
Meaning: Indeed in that is a lesson for those of vision. (3:13)
Vision perceives Him not, but He perceives [all] vision; and He is the Subtle, the Acquainted. (6:103)

Word: وَبَشِّرِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُۖ
Meaning: Breast/chest
So whoever Allah wants to guide - He expands his breast to [contain] Islam; (6:125)

Word: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۖ
Meaning: [This is] a Book revealed to you, [O Muhammad] - so let there not be in your breast distress therefrom - that you may warn thereby (7:2)

Word: وَلَقَدِ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ
Meaning: Breasts/ (chests
Say, "Whether you conceal what is in your breasts or reveal it, Allah knows it. (3:29)
Heart

Word: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسۡلِمۡۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
Meaning: And if you had been rude [in speech] and harsh in heart, they would have disbanded from about you. (3:159)
Hearts

Word: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَن تُغۡنِيَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ
Meaning: Unquestionably, by the remembrance of Allah hearts are assured." (13:28)

Word: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ وَٱلۡجُوعِ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ
Meaning: Soul
And do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden, except by right. (17:33)

Word: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِوَٰلِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيۡتـِيَ مُؤۡمِنٗا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۖ
Meaning: And it is not [possible] for one to die except by permission of Allah at a decree determined. (3:145)

Word: قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ
Meaning: Souls
And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, (2:155)

Word: لِإِيلَٰفِ قُرَيۡشٍ ١ إِۦلَٰفِهِمۡ رِحۡلَةَ ٱلشِّتَآءِ وَٱلصَّيۡفِ ٢ فَلۡيَعۡبُدُواْ رَبَّ هَٰذَا ٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٣
Meaning: Spirit/ Soul

Word: وَإِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا ٱلۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَةٗ لِّلنَّاسِ وَأَمۡنٗا وَٱتَّخِذُواْ مِن مَّقَامِ إِبۡرَٰهِـۧمَ مُصَلّٗىۖ
Meaning: And they ask you, [O Muhammad], about the soul. Say, "The soul is of the affair of my Lord. (17:85)
And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit. (2:87)

Word: لَهُمۡ دَارُ ٱلسَّلَٰمِ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ
Meaning: Power (strength)

Word: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلرَّجۡفَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دَارِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
Meaning: And if only they who have wronged would consider [that] when they see the punishment, that all power belongs to Allah (2:165)
And prepare against them whatever you are able of power and of steeds of war by which you may terrify the enemy of Allah (8:60)

Word: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ خَرَجُواْ مِن دِيَٰرِهِمۡ وَهُمۡ أُلُوفٌ
Meaning: People
Have the people been amazed that We revealed [revelation] to a man from among them, (10:2)

Word: فَمَا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
Meaning: Thus do We recompense the criminal people (10:13)

Word: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَا بَغۡيُكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِكُمۖ مَّتَٰعَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ
Meaning: Nation
And let there be [arising] from you a nation inviting to [all that is] good, enjoining what is right, (3:104)
Nations

Word: وَإِذَا بَدَّلۡنَآ ءَايَةٗ مَّكَانَ ءَايَةٖ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُنَزِّلُ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَآ أَنتَ مُفۡتَرِۭۚ
Meaning: And We have already sent [messengers] to nations before you, [O Muhammad]; then We seized them with poverty and hardship (6:42)
Man (mankind)

Word: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا ٱدۡخُلُواْ هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةَ فَكُلُواْ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمۡ رَغَدٗا
Meaning: And when affliction touches man, he calls upon Us to [remove] an affliction that touched him, (10:12)

Word: أَوۡ كَٱلَّذِي مَرَّ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٖ وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا
Meaning: And Allah wants to lighten for you [your difficulties]; and mankind was created weak. (4:28)
Eminent (chiefs)

Word: وَهَٰذَا كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مُبَارَكٞ مُّصَدِّقُ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَلِتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَاۚ
Meaning: Said the eminent among his people, "Indeed, we see you in clear error." (7:60)

Word: ذَٰلِكَ أَن لَّمۡ يَكُن رَّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا غَٰفِلُونَ
Meaning: Said the eminent among the people of Pharaoh, "Indeed, this is a learned magician (7:109)
Servant

Word: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَمَكۡرٞ مَّكَرۡتُمُوهُ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لِتُخۡرِجُواْ مِنۡهَآ أَهۡلَهَاۖ
Meaning: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down upon Our Servant [Muhammad], then produce a surah (2:23)

Word: وَقَالَ نِسۡوَةٞ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ ٱمۡرَأَتُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ تُرَٰوِدُ فَتَىٰهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ
Meaning: Servants
And when My servants ask you, [O Muhammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near. (2:186)

Word: وَمِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ مَرَدُواْ عَلَى ٱلنِّفَاقِ لَا تَعۡلَمُهُمۡۖ
Meaning: A spring of which the [righteous] servants of Allah will drink; they will make it gush forth in force [and abundance]. (76:6)

Word: يَقُولُونَ لَئِن رَّجَعۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَنَّ ٱلۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡأَذَلَّۚ
Meaning: Enemy
and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy. (2:208)

Word: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ
Meaning: Enemyies

Word: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
Meaning: And remember the favor of Allah upon you - when you were enemies and He brought your hearts together (3:103)
Criminals

Word: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطٗا ١٩ لِّتَسۡلُكُواْ مِنۡهَا سُبُلٗا فِجَاجٗا
Meaning: And thus do We detail the verses, and [thus] the way of the criminals will become evident. (6:55)
The day they see the angels - no good tidings will there be that day for the criminals, and [the angels] will say, "Prevented and inaccessible." (25:22)
Party
Do you covet [the hope, O believers], that they would believe for you while a party of them used to hear the words of Allah and then distort the Torah (2:75)

But is it [not] that every time a messenger came to you, [O Children of Israel], with what your souls did not desire, you were arrogant? And a party [of messengers] you denied and another party you killed. (2:87)
Party / Group
O you who have believed, when you encounter a company [from the enemy forces], stand firm and remember Allah much (8:45)

Word: مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ أَن يَعۡمُرُواْ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ
Meaning: Party / Group
A faction of the people of the Scripture wish they could mislead you. But they do not mislead except themselves, (3:69)

Word: وَمَا يُعَلِّمَانِ مِنۡ أَحَدٍ حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَآ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ فِتۡنَةٞ فَلَا تَكۡفُرۡۖ
Meaning: All/ Everybody /Everyone

Word: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا عِدَّتَهُمۡ إِلَّا فِتۡنَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيَسۡتَيۡقِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُواْ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ
Meaning: Wherever you may be, Allah will bring you forth [for judgement] all together. (2:148)
Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - upon them will be the curse of Allah and of the angels and the people, all together, (2:161)

Word: قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِلِقَآءِ ٱللَّهِۖ
Meaning: Same/ Equal/ Straight

Word: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰهُمۡ كَمَا نَسُواْ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِهِمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَا كَانُواْ بِ‍َٔايَٰتِنَا يَجۡحَدُون
Meaning: Indeed, those who disbelieve - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe. (2:6)
And whoever exchanges faith for disbelief has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way. (2:108)

Word: وَٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشۡرِكُواْ بِهِۦ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَبِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ
Meaning: Name

Word: مَّآ أَفَآءَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِهِۦ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِـذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ
Meaning: [He was told], "O Zechariah, indeed We give you good tidings of a boy whose name will be John. (19:7)
And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them (22:34)

Word: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَٰقَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ لَا تَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَانٗا
Meaning: Companion Inmate

Word: وَٱعۡبُدُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُشۡرِكُواْ بِهِۦ شَيۡـٔٗاۖ وَبِٱلۡوَٰلِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَٰنٗا وَبِذِي ٱلۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَٱلۡيَتَٰمَىٰ
Meaning: His companion said to him while he was conversing with him, "Have you disbelieved in He who created you from dust (18:37)
Companion (Inmates)

Word: وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِۖ
Meaning: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions (inmates) of the Fire; (2:39)
Pharaoh
Then We sent after them Moses and Aaron to Pharaoh and his establishment (10:75)

Word: قَالَتۡ إِنَّ أَبِـي يَدۡعُوكَ لِيَجۡزِيَكَ أَجۡرَ مَا سَقَيۡتَ لَنَاۚ
Meaning: And [recall] when We saved your forefathers from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, (2:49)

Word: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ
Meaning: Christians
And they say, "None will enter Paradise except one who is a Jew or a Christian." (2:111)

Word: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَآ أَلۡفَيۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
Meaning: But the Jews and the Christians say, "We are the children of Allah and His beloved." (5:18)

Word: قَالُواْ بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَدۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَابَآءَنَآۚ
Meaning: Women/ wives

"O Mary, indeed Allah has chosen you and purified you and chosen you above the women of the worlds. (2:42)
And they request from you, [O Muhammad], a [legal] ruling concerning women. Say, "Allah gives you a ruling about them and [about] what has been recited to you (4:127)

Word: وَقُلۡنَا يَٰٓـَٔادَمُ ٱسۡكُنۡ أَنتَ وَزَوۡجُكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
Meaning: Men

Word: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكُم مِّن نَّفۡسٖ وَٰحِدَةٖ وَجَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا لِيَسۡكُنَ إِلَيۡهَاۖ
Meaning: And We sent not before you [as messengers] except men to whom We revealed from among the people of cities. (12:109)
And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; (22:27)

Word: أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ
Meaning: Bones
And they say, "When we are bones and crumbled particles, will we [truly] be resurrected as a new creation?" (17:49)
and We made [from] the clot, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; (23:14)

Word: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ ٱمۡرَأَةٗ تَمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ
Meaning: The dead
So, We said, "Strike the slain man with part of it." Thus does Allah bring the dead to life, and He shows you His signs (2:73)

Word: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ
Meaning: and when you brought forth the dead with My permission. (5:110)
Hands

Word: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبۡ لِي مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةٗ طَيِّبَةًۖ
Meaning: So woe to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allah," (2:79)

Word: وَلۡيَخۡشَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَوۡ تَرَكُواْ مِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّةٗ ضِعَٰفًا خَافُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡ
Meaning: But they will never wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. (2:95)
Eyes

Word: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ
Meaning: And when they hear what has been revealed to the Messenger, you see their eyes overflowing with tears because of what they have recognized of the truth. (5:83)
and when they threw, they bewitched the eyes of the people and struck terror into them, and they presented a great [feat of] magic. (7:116)

Word: قَدۡ خَسِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَتَلُوٓاْ أَوۡلَٰدَهُمۡ سَفَهَۢا بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٖ
Meaning: Spouses
Gardens of perpetual residence; they will enter them with whoever were righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their descendants. (13:23)

Word: وَءَاتَيۡنَا عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَيَّدۡنَٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلۡقُدُسِۗ
Meaning: And We have already sent messengers before you and assigned to them wives and descendants. (13:38)
Inclinations/ Desires

Word: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُۥ كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَبۡنَآءَهُمۡۖ
Meaning: And judge, [O Muhammad], between them by what Allah has revealed and do not follow their inclinations and beware of them, (5:49)
Say, "I will not follow your desires, for I would then have gone astray, and I would not be of the [rightly] guided." (6:56)

Word: قُلۡ إِصۡلَاحٞ لَّهُمۡ خَيۡرٞۖ وَإِن تُخَالِطُوهُمۡ فَإِخۡوَٰنُكُمۡۚ
Meaning: Minds/ Understanding

Word: وَمِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡۖ وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
Meaning: And there is for you in legal retribution [saving of] life, O you [people] of understanding, that you may become righteous. (2:179)
[This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded. (38:29)

Word: فَإِن كَانَ ٱلَّذِي عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡحَقُّ سَفِيهًا أَوۡ ضَعِيفًا أَوۡ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُ أَن يُمِلَّ هُوَ فَلۡيُمۡلِلۡ وَلِيُّهُۥ بِٱلۡعَدۡلِۚ
Meaning: Doors/ Gates
Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them. (38:50)

Word: لَّا يَتَّخِذِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ
Meaning: And she, in whose house he was, sought to seduce him. She closed the doors (12:23)
Oaths

Word: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَنُحۡيِيَنَّهُۥ حَيَوٰةٗ طَيِّبَةٗۖ
Meaning: Indeed, those who exchange the covenant of Allah and their [own] oaths for a small price will have no share in the Hereafter, (3:77)

Word: وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
Meaning: And to those whom your oaths have bound [to you] - give them their share. (4:33)

Word: رَبِّ إِنِّي وَضَعۡتُهَآ أُنثَىٰ وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا وَضَعَتۡ وَلَيۡسَ ٱلذَّكَرُ كَٱلۡأُنثَىٰۖ
وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ
ذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَ ٱللَّهِۖ
إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
فَمَن يُرِدِ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَهۡدِيَهُۥ يَشۡرَحۡ صَدۡرَهُۥ لِلۡإِسۡلَٰمِۖ
كِتَٰبٌ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكَ فَلَا يَكُن فِي صَدۡرِكَ حَرَجٞ مِّنۡهُ لِتُنذِرَ بِهِ
قُلۡ إِن تُخۡفُواْ مَا فِي صُدُورِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُبۡدُوهُ يَعۡلَمۡهُ ٱللَّهُۗ
وَلَوۡ كُنتَ فَظًّا غَلِيظَ ٱلۡقَلۡبِ لَٱنفَضُّواْ مِنۡ حَوۡلِكَۖ
وَلَا تَقۡتُلُواْ ٱلنَّفۡسَ ٱلَّتِي حَرَّمَ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ
وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَن تَمُوتَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِ كِتَٰبٗا مُّؤَجَّلٗاۗ
وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُم بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡخَوۡفِ وَٱلۡجُوعِ وَنَقۡصٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰلِ وَٱلۡأَنفُسِ وَٱلثَّمَرَٰتِۗ
وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلرُّوحِۖ قُلِ ٱلرُّوحُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّي
وَءَاتَيۡنَا عِيسَى ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَأَيَّدۡنَٰهُ بِرُوحِ ٱلۡقُدُسِۗ
وَلَوۡ يَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ إِذۡ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَنَّ ٱلۡقُوَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعٗا
وَأَعِدُّواْ لَهُم مَّا ٱسۡتَطَعۡتُم مِّن قُوَّةٖ وَمِن رِّبَاطِ ٱلۡخَيۡلِ تُرۡهِبُونَ بِهِۦ عَدُوَّ ٱللَّهِ
أَكَانَ لِلنَّاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ
وَلۡتَكُن مِّنكُمۡ أُمَّةٞ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِٱلۡمَعۡرُوفِ
وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُم بِٱلۡبَأۡسَآءِ وَٱلضَّرَّآءِ
وَإِذَا مَسَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ ٱلضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَنۢبِهِ
يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمۡۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ ضَعِيفٗا
قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِهِۦٓ إِنَّا لَنَرَىٰكَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
قَالَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِن قَوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ
وَإِن كُنتُمۡ فِي رَيۡبٖ مِّمَّا نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِنَا فَأۡتُواْ بِسُورَةٖ
وَإِذَا سَأَلَكَ عِبَادِي عَنِّي فَإِنِّي قَرِيبٌۖ
عَيۡنٗا يَشۡرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ ٱللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفۡجِيرٗا
وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
وَٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ كُنتُمۡ أَعۡدَآءٗ فَأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِكُمۡ
وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُفَصِّلُ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا
أَفَتَطۡمَعُونَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُواْ لَكُمۡ وَقَدۡ كَانَ فَرِيقٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ كَلَٰمَ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُحَرِّفُونَهُ
أَفَكُلَّمَا جَآءَكُمۡ رَسُولُۢ بِمَا لَا تَهۡوَىٰٓ أَنفُسُكُمُ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ فَفَرِيقٗا كَذَّبۡتُمۡ وَفَرِيقٗا تَقۡتُلُونَ
يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَةٗ وَٱذۡكُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا
وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٞ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَوۡ يُضِلُّونَكُمۡ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ
أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُواْ يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ جَمِيعًاۚ
إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَمَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ  كُفَّارٌ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةُ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ
إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
وَمَن يَتَبَدَّلِ ٱلۡكُفۡرَ بِٱلۡإِيمَٰنِ فَقَدۡ ضَلَّ سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ
يَٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ ٱسۡمُهُۥ يَحۡيَىٰ
وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ جَعَلۡنَا مَنسَكٗا لِّيَذۡكُرُواْ ٱسۡمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم
قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرۡتَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٖ
وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ
ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِم مُّوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِ
وَإِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَٰكُم مِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ سُوٓءَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ
وَقَالُواْ لَن يَدۡخُلَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ إِلَّا مَن كَانَ هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَٰرَىٰۗ
وَقَالَتِ ٱلۡيَهُودُ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ نَحۡنُ أَبۡنَٰٓؤُاْ ٱللَّهِ وَأَحِبَّٰٓؤُهُۥۚ
يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
وَيَسۡتَفۡتُونَكَ فِي ٱلنِّسَآءِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ يُفۡتِيكُمۡ فِيهِنَّ وَمَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ
وَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ إِلَّا رِجَالٗا نُّوحِيٓ إِلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓۗ
وَأَذِّن فِي النَّاسِ بِالْحَجِّ يَأْتُوكَ رِجَالًا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٍ
وَقَالُوٓاْ أَءِذَا كُنَّا عِظَٰمٗا وَرُفَٰتًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبۡعُوثُونَ خَلۡقٗا جَدِيدٗا
فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَةٗ فَخَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَٰمٗا فَكَسَوۡنَا ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ لَحۡمٗا
فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحۡيِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِ
فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُبُونَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُمَّ يَقُولُونَ هَٰذَا مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ
وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوۡهُ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
وَإِذَا سَمِعُواْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ تَرَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنَهُمۡ تَفِيضُ مِنَ ٱلدَّمۡعِ مِمَّا عَرَفُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡحَقِّۖ
فَلَمَّآ أَلۡقَوۡاْ سَحَرُوٓاْ أَعۡيُنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱسۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَجَآءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظِيمٖ
جَنَّٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡۖ
وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلٗا مِّن قَبۡلِكَ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗا وَذُرِّيَّةٗۚ
وَأَنِ ٱحۡكُم بَيۡنَهُم بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡ وَٱحۡذَرۡهُمۡ
قُل لَّآ أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡوَآءَكُمۡ قَدۡ ضَلَلۡتُ إِذٗا وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ
وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
كِتَٰبٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ إِلَيۡكَ مُبَٰرَكٞ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ
وَرَٰوَدَتۡهُ ٱلَّتِي هُوَ فِي بَيۡتِهَا عَن نَّفۡسِهِۦ وَغَلَّقَتِ ٱلۡأَبۡوَٰبَ
إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشۡتَرُونَ بِعَهۡدِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ ثَمَنٗا قَلِيلًا أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَا خَلَٰقَ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ
